wa_thankyou_message: Thank you, I would like to make a booking.

ulundanu.title: Ulun Danu Bratan Temple
ulundanu.subtitle: Ulun Danu Bratan Temple stands gracefully on the shores of Lake Bratan in Bedugul. Surrounded by misty mountains and calm water, it symbolizes harmony between humans, nature, and God.

tegalalang.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace, Ubud
tegalalang.subtitle: Enjoy the beauty of Tegalalang’s rice terraces — a UNESCO-recognized irrigation heritage of Bali.

kecak.title: Uluwatu Kecak Dance
kecak.subtitle: Watch the traditional Kecak dance at Uluwatu Temple during sunset, with a stunning ocean view.

lovina.title: Lovina Beach, North Bali
lovina.subtitle: Experience the calm Lovina Beach, famous for dolphin watching and peaceful vibes.

lempuyang.title: Lempuyang Temple
lempuyang.subtitle: Known for the ‘Gate of Heaven’, this temple offers breathtaking views of Mount Agung.

kelingking.title: Nusa Penida Kelingking Beach
kelingking.subtitle: Famous for its T-Rex cliff shape and turquoise sea — a must-see Bali destination.

trip.subtitle: Exciting adventures in Bali await you. Choose your favorite trip!

aboutHome.desc1: Moyo Bali Driver is ready to help you explore the beauty of Bali with experienced local Balinese drivers who speak English fluently. We are here to provide a comfortable, safe, and warm travel experience with genuine Balinese hospitality.
aboutHome.desc2: We believe every journey has its own story — from airport transfers and tours to hidden spots only locals know. Enjoy the flexibility of our services and the sincere friendliness of Balinese people on every trip.

items.title: Local Balinese Drivers
items.desc: Explore Bali with native Balinese drivers who know every hidden spot and the culture behind it.

items.title: Comfort & Safety First
items.desc: Clean, air-conditioned cars and professional drivers who always prioritize your comfort and safety.

items.title: Flexible & Personalized Trips
items.desc: Every trip is tailored to your interests — from temple tours to hidden waterfalls.

items.title: Trusted by Many Travelers
items.desc: Hundreds of happy guests recommend Moyo Bali Travel for honesty, punctuality, and friendliness.

airporthome.subtitle: Transparent Pricing
airporthome.title: Bali Airport
airporthome.desc: Comfortable, reliable airport transfer service with professional drivers and modern vehicles.

tourhome.desc: Our tour offers you a greater opportunity to learn about Balinese culture, religion, arts, traditional life, and the stunning natural beauty of Bali’s countryside and nearby islands.

tourPackages.title: South Bali Tour
tourPackages.description: Explore exotic beaches, culture, and top highlights of South Bali.

tourPackages.title: Nusa Penida Tour
tourPackages.description: See iconic cliffs, hidden beaches, and the best photo spots in Nusa Penida.

tourPackages.title: Tour Activity
tourPackages.description: Exciting activity options: thrilling watersports and other nature adventures.

tourPackages.title: Lembongan Tour
tourPackages.description: Enjoy serene beaches, Yellow Bridge, and snorkeling spots on Lembongan Island.

experienceSection.subtitle: Our Experience
experienceSection.description: For more than a decade, we've been helping thousands of travelers explore the beauty of Bali safely and comfortably. Our team is dedicated to delivering authentic, friendly, and memorable travel experiences in every destination you visit.

faqs.question: Is transportation available 24 hours?
faqs.answer: Yes, we operate 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Whether your boat arrives early in the morning or late at night, our driver will be ready to pick you up anytime.

faqs.question: Can I choose my own destinations?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You are free to decide where you want to go. Whether it’s a direct hotel transfer, a stop at tourist attractions, or a full-day tour — we can adjust to your preferences.

faqs.question: How do I book a driver?
faqs.answer: You can book through our website, WhatsApp, or by calling us directly. We recommend booking in advance, especially during Bali’s high seasons.

faqs.question: Are your drivers experienced?
faqs.answer: Yes! All our drivers are local professionals — friendly, experienced, and English-speaking. They can also give you tips about hidden gems around Bali.

faqs.question: Can I make stops along the way?
faqs.answer: Of course! You’re welcome to stop for photos, food, or shopping. Just let us know in advance so we can adjust the schedule accordingly.

faqs.question: Do you offer only transfers or also day tours?
faqs.answer: We offer both. You can book a one-way transfer, a full-day private tour, or even multi-day packages. Our drivers can also serve as local guides if needed.

faqs.question: Is your transportation service safe?
faqs.answer: Your safety is our top priority. Our drivers are licensed and experienced, our vehicles are insured, and we always follow traffic regulations. Your trip will be smooth and secure.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Plan Your Best Vacation in Bali?
ctaSection.description: Contact us now to get the best tour package offers and professional driver services.

aboutSubtitle: Your trusted partner to explore the beauty of Bali with the best tour packages and local drivers.

airportpage.description: We ensure your journey from the airport to your dream destination runs smoothly, safely, and on time with our best vehicles.

airportTransfer.intro: “Welcome to Bali.” With Moyo Bali Travel, your journey begins with comfort and professional service from the moment you land on the Island of the Gods.
airportTransfer.servicesDesc: Moyo Bali Travel provides private transfers from the airport or port with experienced, friendly, and English-speaking drivers, ensuring your journey is safe and comfortable.

servicesList.title: Available 24/7
servicesList.desc: Our service is ready whenever you arrive.

servicesList.title: Private & Comfortable Vehicles
servicesList.desc: Modern fleet and professional drivers ready to serve you.

servicesList.title: Flexible Service
servicesList.desc: Hotel pick-up or full-day tours according to your needs.

airportTransfer.note: Shuttle prices are adjusted according to the distance to your destination.

airportIntro: Moyo Bali Travel is a professional transportation service in Bali, ready to accompany you on your journey exploring the beauty of the Island of the Gods.

driver_section.title: Driver Service
driver_section.description: Moyo Bali Travel provides professional transportation services with experienced local Balinese drivers who are friendly and fluent in English. We ensure your journey is safe, comfortable, and enjoyable.

about_story.title: The Story Behind
about_story.description_1: Moyo Bali Travel was born from a genuine passion to deliver unforgettable travel experiences across the enchanting island of Bali. Starting as a simple private transportation service, we have grown into a trusted partner for thousands of travelers, both local and international.
about_story.description_2: Our vision is to become Bali’s leading provider of transportation and tour services — prioritizing comfort, safety, punctuality, and the legendary Balinese hospitality in every trip we offer.

cta.title: Start Your Journey Now
cta.description: Explore Bali with Moyo Bali Travel – local Balinese drivers, comfortable vehicles, and professional service ready to guide you every step of the way.

adventure.description: Explore the beauty of Bali with our trusted service. We are committed to providing a safe, comfortable, and unforgettable vacation experience for every traveler.

safe.title: Safe Traveling
safe.desc: Travel safely with professional drivers and well-maintained vehicles.

comfort.desc: Comfortable accommodation options tailored to your needs.

contactSectionFull.addressText: Jl. Raya Ubud, Gianyar, Bali, Indonesia

kuta.description: Famous beach area with shopping and vibrant nightlife.

jimbaran.description: Enjoy beachfront seafood and a relaxing vibe near the airport.

nusa-dua.description: Luxury resorts, white sandy beaches, and fine dining spots.

uluwatu.description: Iconic cliffs, great surf waves, and stunning sunsets.

ubud.description: Cultural and artistic center surrounded by lush greenery.

tegallalang.description: Beautiful rice terraces with authentic village charm.

padangbai.description: Port to Gili and Lombok with lovely beaches and snorkeling.

amed.description: Diving paradise in East Bali with a peaceful atmosphere.

candidasa.description: Quiet coastal area with traditional Balinese culture.

tulamben.description: Diver’s paradise with the famous USAT Liberty wreck.

lovina.description: Calm and natural, known for dolphin-watching tours.

pemuteran.description: Western Bali gem with coral gardens and ferry to Java.

tours.title: Uluwatu Sunset Romance – Explore Culture, Ocean & the Most Romantic Dinner Experience
tours.description: Experience a magical escape to South Bali, highlighted by the breathtaking cliff-side panorama of Uluwatu. Indulge in the pristine beauty of Padang-Padang Beach, then be captivated by the iconic sunset Kecak Dance before savoring a romantic seafood dinner on Jimbaran's sandy shores.
program: Hotel pick-up around 13:00 and relaxing drive to Garuda Wisnu Kencana
Arrive at GWK and explore the landmark while enjoying Bali’s cultural scenery
Continue the tour to Padang-Padang Beach to relax and enjoy the beautiful coastline
Proceed to Uluwatu Temple to explore the cliff-top temple with stunning ocean panorama
Watch the iconic Kecak Dance performance right at sunset with a spectacular atmosphere
Head to Jimbaran Beach for a romantic seafood dinner by the shore
Return to the hotel safely and comfortably
includes: Mineral Water and Snacks in the Car
tours.note: Perfect for couples or travelers who wish to experience culture, romance, and ocean atmosphere in one trip.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I’m interested in the Uluwatu Sunset Romance package. Could you help me with the booking?

tours.title: Central Bali Cultural Trail: Dance, Temple, Waterfall & Agritourism
tours.description: An in-depth exploration of culture and nature in the heart of Bali. Witness the iconic traditional dance, visit the magnificent Batuan temple, enjoy the refreshing Kanto Lampo Waterfall, and sample Balinese coffee on an agritourism stop.
program: Hotel pick-up and begin the journey in the morning towards Batubulan
Watch the Barong & Keris Dance as an introduction to Balinese culture
Proceed to Batuan Temple: Explore the temple with its magnificent classic Balinese architecture (Free time for a light lunch in this area)
Continue to Kanto Lampo Waterfall: Enjoy and take photos at this beautiful tiered waterfall
Afterwards, visit the Agrowisata (Coffee Agritourism): See the process of Luwak Coffee, and enjoy a tasting session of various Balinese coffees
In the afternoon, the final stop is the Silver or Batik Art Workshop: See the process of making silver or batik crafts in the Celuk/Tohpati area (Last stop for souvenir shopping before returning)
Return journey to the Hotel in the late afternoon/early evening
includes: Mineral Water and Snacks in the Car
tours.note: Focuses on culture, art, and agritourism. Suitable for lovers of art, local culinary experiences, and natural waterfalls.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I'm interested in the Central Bali Cultural Trail package. Can you help me book it?

tours.title: North Ubud Tranquility: Holy Temple, Traditional Village & Iconic Rice Terraces
tours.description: Experience the spiritual peace and eternal cultural heritage of North Ubud. Visit the sacred Tirta Empul Temple, explore the architectural beauty of Penglipuran Traditional Village, and enjoy the panoramic view of Tegalalang rice fields.
program: Hotel pick-up and begin the journey in the morning towards the Tampaksiring region.
Visit Tirta Empul Temple: A spiritual visit to the holy water temple. Here, you can observe or participate in the purification ritual (Melukat) in the sacred pool.
Continue the trip to Penglipuran Traditional Village: Explore the cleanest traditional village in the world, see the unique traditional house architecture and peaceful village culture.

Head to Tegalalang Rice Terrace: Enjoy the iconic and charming view of the cascading rice fields. This area is also the Free Time for Lunch, where you can dine at a restaurant overlooking the rice fields.
Proceed to Ubud Palace & Market: Explore Puri Ubud and the lively Ubud Art Market, free time to experience the local cultural atmosphere and shop for crafts and souvenirs.
Return journey to the Hotel in the late afternoon/early evening.
includes: Mineral Water and Snacks in the Car
tours.note: Focuses on spirituality, traditional villages, and the nature of North Ubud. Suitable for those seeking peace and cultural heritage.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I'm interested in the North Ubud Tranquility package. Can you help me book it?

tours.title: Echo of History & Tukad Cepung: Ubud Adventure & Cave Magic
tours.description: This package combines wildlife, ancient archaeological sites, and hidden natural wonders. Experience a jungle adventure in central Ubud and discover the spectacular waterfall inside a cave.
program: Hotel pick-up and begin the journey in the morning towards central Ubud.
Explore Ubud Monkey Forest: Explore the unique and shady monkey forest in the heart of the city.
Continue to Goa Gajah Temple (Elephant Cave): Visit the archaeological site with ancient cave architecture dating back to the 9th century.
Head to Tukad Cepung Waterfall: Explore the waterfall hidden inside a cave, ideal during midday to catch dramatic sunbeam effects (Free time for lunch in this area).
In the afternoon, explore Ubud Palace & Art Market: Visit the palace and the bustling art market in the city center, free time to shop for crafts and souvenirs.
Return journey to the Hotel in the late afternoon/early evening.
includes: Mineral Water and Snacks in the Car
tours.note: Focuses on nature adventure, history, and unique photo opportunities. The route flows from Central Ubud to the East (Gianyar) and returns.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I'm interested in the Echo of History & Tukad Cepung package. Can you help me book it?

tours.title: West Bali Beauty: Lake, World Heritage Rice Fields & Tanah Lot Sunset
tours.description: An epic journey to the highlands of Bali. Enjoy the panorama of Lake Beratan, explore the UNESCO heritage rice terraces in Jatiluwih, and end the day with a stunning sunset view at Tanah Lot Temple.
program: Hotel pick-up and begin the journey in the morning towards North Bali
Express your photo style at Wanagiri Hills and Handara Gate (Iconic photo spots in the mountain area)
Continue to Ulun Danu Beratan Temple: Explore the Temple that stands beautifully on the shore of Lake Beratan
Lunch Time: Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant with views of the surrounding lake or mountains
Trekking at Jatiluwih Rice Terraces: Explore the rice terraces recognized as a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site
In the late afternoon, head to Tanah Lot Temple: Explore the Temple located amidst the sea while waiting for and enjoying the sunset view
Return to the hotel safely and comfortably
includes: Mineral Water and Snacks in the Car
tours.note: This route is a long full-day tour (Bedugul-Jatiluwih-Tanah Lot), the price is slightly higher due to the long distance traveled.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I'm interested in the West Bali Beauty (Tanah Lot Sunset) package. Can you help me book it?

tours.title: East Bali Exoticism: Gate of Heaven, Water Palaces & Virgin Beach
tours.description: An extraordinary journey to the east of Bali, focusing on royal heritage and natural beauty. Visit Lempuyang Temple, famous for the Gate of Heaven, two historic water palaces, and enjoy relaxing time at the virgin beach.
program: Hotel pick-up very early in the morning to avoid long queues at Lempuyang Temple
Journey towards East Bali
Visit Pura Lempuyang (Gate of Heaven): Take the iconic photo with Mount Agung in the background
Continue to Tirta Gangga Water Palace: Explore the water palace with beautiful fish ponds and water gardens
Lunch Time: Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant in the Karangasem area
Visit Taman Ujung Sukasada: Explore the floating water palace, a relic of the Karangasem kingdom
In the afternoon, relax at Virgin Beach: Enjoy the tranquil white sand beach
Return to the hotel safely and comfortably
includes: Mineral Water and Snacks in the Car
tours.note: This is the longest route (10-12 hour Full Day Tour). Pick-up must be done very early (around 06:00-07:00 AM) to get a reasonable queue time at Lempuyang Temple.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I'm interested in the East Bali Exoticism (Lempuyang) package. Can you help me book it?

tours.title: Dolphin Adventure & The Beauty of Lake Beratan Temple
tours.description: Experience the thrill of a morning adventure watching wild dolphins in Lovina. Followed by a nature challenge at Aling-Aling Waterfall, enjoying the cool twin lake view, and visiting the iconic floating temple on Lake Beratan.
program: Hotel pick-up very early in the morning to reach Lovina before sunrise
Dolphin Watching Lovina Beach: Take a traditional boat to witness wild dolphins dancing in the North Bali sea during sunrise
After a light breakfast, continue to the waterfall area
Visit Aling-Aling Waterfall: Explore the waterfall complex that offers the opportunity for natural sliding or jumping (accompanied by a local guide)
Continue the journey south through the mountains
Stop briefly at Twin Lake View (Buyan & Tamblingan Lakes): Enjoy the twin lake view and the cool mountain air (This area is also Free Time for Lunch)
Visit Pura Ulun Danu Beratan: Explore the iconic temple that stands on the shore of Lake Beratan in the cool climate of Bedugul
Return to the hotel safely and comfortably
includes: Mineral Water and Snacks in the Car
tours.note: This is the longest route with the earliest departure. Aling-Aling entrance fees (including mandatory local guide for water activities) are not included.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I'm interested in the Dolphin Adventure & Lake Beratan Temple package. Can you help me book it?

tours.title: Melukat Experience: Self-Purification at Tirta Empul & Beji Griya Holy Water
tours.description: Experience a spiritual cleansing journey through the traditional Balinese Melukat ritual. This activity is designed for physical, mental, and spiritual purification. You have the freedom to choose the sacred location that resonates most with you. Available Melukat location choices include: Tirta Empul Temple, famous for its holy springs. Or Beji Griya Waterfall which combines natural beauty with sacred tradition.
program: Hotel pick-up and travel to the selected Melukat location (Tirta Empul Temple or Beji Griya)
Arrive at the location, preparation to wear sarong and special cloth, and a brief introduction to the ritual
Perform the Melukat self-purification ceremony in the sacred pool or waterfall, guided by a local facilitator
After the ritual, clean up and change clothes
Return transfer to the hotel
tours.note:
Price varies depending on the location and number of participants. Price details per person:

Tirta Empul Temple (or similar location):
- 4 People or More: IDR 500,000/Pax
- 3 People: IDR 600,000/Pax
- 2 People: IDR 700,000/Pax

Beji Griya Waterfall:
- 4 People or More: IDR 650,000/Pax
- 3 People: IDR 800,000/Pax
- 2 People: IDR 900,000/Pax
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Traditional Self-Purification Ceremony (Melukat) package. Can you help with booking?

tours.title: Chasing Dolphins: Sunrise Dolphin Watching Lovina
tours.description: Enjoy a morning adventure at the tranquil Lovina Beach, home to friendly wild dolphins. Ride a traditional Balinese boat (Jukung) before sunrise and witness a pod of dolphins leaping in their natural habitat, against the backdrop of a stunning sunrise. This tour offers a perfect blend of natural beauty, cultural experience, and a peaceful start to your day in Bali.
program: Early morning pick-up (around 03:00-03:30 AM) from the hotel
Land travel to Lovina Beach in North Bali
Receive Safety Briefing and board the traditional boat (Jukung)
Witness a pod of wild dolphins during sunrise (Dolphin Watching)
Opportunity to Swim Near the Dolphins
Return to the beach, Lunch, and return transfer to the hotel
tours.note:
Price is based on the selected travel mode:

- Sharing Boat: IDR 650,000/Pax
- Private Boat: IDR 800,000/Pax

(Minimum Booking 2 people)
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Sunrise Dolphin Watching Lovina package. I plan to choose [SHARING/PRIVATE] mode for [NUMBER] people. Please advise on availability and booking.

tours.title: Sunrise Thrill: Mount Batur Sunrise & Black Lava Jeep Adventure
tours.description: Enjoy an amazing morning adventure on Mount Batur! Ride a 4WD Jeep to the best viewpoint to witness the mesmerizing sunrise. After enjoying the dawn, explore the vast expanse of unique black lava fields, remnants of past volcanic eruptions. This tour offers a perfect blend of natural beauty, extreme experience, and a glimpse into Bali's volcanic history.
program: Early morning pick-up (around 03:00-04:00 AM) from the hotel
Travel to Kintamani and transfer to the 4x4 Jeep
Jeep ride to the best spot to witness the Mount Batur Sunrise
Enjoy Coffee & Tea and Light Breakfast while enjoying the dawn view
Exploration of the unique Black Lava area by Jeep
Return to the Jeep starting point and drop-off back at the hotel
includes: Insurance Coverage by the Jeep Operator
whatToBring: Thick Jacket (Very important due to the cold)
tours.note:
Price varies depending on the type of Jeep selected. Minimum booking of 2 people.

- Long Jeep (Max 6 pax): IDR 650,000/Pax
- 4x4 Jeep (Short Jeep, Max 3 pax): IDR 850,000/Pax
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Mount Batur Sunrise & Black Lava Jeep Experience package. I want to choose the [JEEP 4X4/LONG JEEP] option for [NUMBER] people. Please advise on availability.

tours.title: Dawn Challenge: Mount Batur Sunrise Summit Trekking
tours.description: Experience the challenge and satisfaction of climbing Mount Batur in the dark to witness the legendary sunrise from its peak (1,717 meters above sea level). This climb is guided by a professional guide and is suitable for intermediate hikers. The view of the Batur Caldera, Lake Batur, and Mount Agung at dawn is a priceless reward for your effort.
program: Early morning pick-up (around 01:30-02:30 AM) from the hotel
Arrive at the starting point and receive Safety Briefing from the Guide
Begin the climb (trekking) to the Mount Batur Summit (approx. 2 hours)
Enjoy the Sunrise while having a Light Breakfast
Descend back to the starting point (approx. 1.5 hours)
Return transfer to the hotel
tours.note:
Price varies depending on the selected trekking mode. Minimum booking of 2 people.

- Sharing Trekking (Joining another group): IDR 600,000/Pax
- Private Trekking: IDR 800,000/Pax
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Mount Batur Sunrise Hiking Experience package. I want to choose the [SHARING/PRIVATE] option for [NUMBER] people. Please advise on availability.

tours.title: Underwater Exploration: Snorkeling at Blue Lagoon & Tanjung Jepun
tours.description: Dive into the clear and calm waters of Blue Lagoon, Padangbai. Known as one of the best snorkeling spots in Bali, Blue Lagoon offers a rich diversity of healthy coral reefs and colorful tropical fish. You will visit two locations: the beautiful Blue Lagoon and Tanjung Jepun, ensuring a maximum underwater experience. This activity is suitable for beginners to experts.
program: Hotel pick-up and travel to Padangbai (East Bali)
Arrive at Padangbai, receive Safety Briefing and get snorkeling equipment
Traditional boat departs for Blue Lagoon for the first snorkeling session (approx. 1 hour)
Continue to Tanjung Jepun for the second snorkeling session (approx. 1 hour)
Return to the beach, enjoy Lunch
Return transfer to the hotel
tours.note: This standard price is based on group bookings. Prices may vary depending on the pick-up location (South Bali/Ubud areas) and the number of participants. Please contact us for group pricing details.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Snorkeling at Blue Lagoon & Tanjung Jepun package. Please advise on availability and price for [NUMBER] people.

tours.title: Kintamani Cycling: Downhill Bike Adventure in Balinese Villages
tours.description: Enjoy a refreshing day cycling downhill from Kintamani. This route passes beautiful rice paddies, bamboo forests, and traditional Balinese villages, giving you an authentic view of local daily life and culture. The bike ride is relaxed, suitable for all ages and fitness levels.
program: Hotel pick-up and travel to Kintamani
Light breakfast served with stunning views of Mount Batur
Arrive at the cycling start point, receive Safety Briefing and equipment
Begin the downhill bike ride, passing rice fields and traditional villages
Indonesian Lunch
Return transfer to the hotel
tours.note: The price of IDR 450,000/person is valid for a minimum booking of 2 people. The price includes all facilities mentioned above.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Kintamani Cycling Tour package. Please advise on availability and booking for [NUMBER] people.

tours.title: Night Mystery: Bali Zoo Night Safari Journey
tours.description: Experience an unforgettable adventure at Bali Zoo, where the nighttime brings a unique experience. Start with a walk through the zoo, followed by a thrilling Night Safari journey inside a specialized tram to observe nocturnal animals' habits. The evening concludes with a dazzling African fire dance performance and a chance to interact directly with some exotic animals.
program: Afternoon pick-up from the hotel
Arrive at Bali Zoo and receive the Night Safari Journey ticket
Safari Walk through the zoo area
Witness the Animal Encounter & Show
Night Safari Journey exploring the life of nocturnal animals
Exclusive Dinner in a unique area
Watch The Rhythm of African Fire Dance Show
Return transfer to the hotel
includes: The Rhythm of African Fire Dance Show
tours.note: The price of IDR 1,500,000/Pax is the price per person for the Night Safari Journey package (Minimum 2 Pax). The price includes private hotel transfers.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Bali Zoo Night Safari Journey package. Please advise on availability and booking for [NUMBER] people.

tours.title: Bali Rafting Adventure: Conquering the Ayung River
tours.description: Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping journey down one of Bali's most beautiful rivers. With professional guidance, you will pass through lush tropical forests, beautiful waterfalls, and conquer challenging rapids. This activity is suitable for all levels and guarantees total fun. After completing the track, enjoy a delicious buffet lunch to perfectly complement the blend of adventure and relaxation.
program: Hotel pick-up and travel to the Rafting location
Arrive at the location, Safety Briefing from a professional guide
Put on safety equipment and start the Rafting adventure on the river
Enjoy views of the jungle, waterfalls, and river rapids
Arrive at the finish point, clean up at the Changing Room & Shower
Enjoy Lunch
Return transfer to the hotel
whatToBring: Shoes and Sandals Safe for Water
tours.note:
Price varies depending on the selected transfer mode. Minimum booking of 2 people.

- Sharing Transport (Joining a Group): IDR 550,000/Pax
- Private Transport (Private Car): IDR 850,000/Pax

**Additional Note:** For pick-ups outside the Jimbaran, Nusadua, Uluwatu, and Pecatu areas, an extra charge of IDR 200K per car applies.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Bali Rafting Adventure: Conquering the Ayung River package. I want to choose the [SHARING/PRIVATE] option for [NUMBER] people. Please advise on availability.

tours.title: Adrenaline Off-Road: Bali Buggy UTV Ride Adventure
tours.description: Experience the thrilling adventure of riding a Buggy or UTV through challenging off-road tracks. Your route will pass through lush tropical forests, rice fields, muddy paths, and rocky terrain. This activity is highly adrenaline-pumping and suitable for those seeking extreme excitement in the open nature of Bali.
program: Hotel pick-up and travel to the UTV/Buggy location
Arrive at the location, receive Safety Briefing and driving equipment
UTV/Buggy Ride Session (Duration ±1 to 1.5 hours) on off-road terrain
Clean up at the changing room and shower facilities
Enjoy Lunch
Return transfer to the hotel
tours.note:
Price varies depending on the selected driving mode (Minimum 2 Pax for Tandem):

- Single Ride (1 person in 1 Buggy): IDR 1,500,000 / Pax
- Tandem Ride (2 people in 1 Buggy): IDR 2,000,000 / 2 Pax
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Bali Buggy UTV Ride Adventure package. I want to choose the [SINGLE RIDE/TANDEM RIDE] option for [NUMBER] people. Please advise on availability.

tours.title: Adrenaline 4x4: Bali ATV Quad Bike Jungle & Rice Field Adventure
tours.description: Experience the thrill of riding an ATV Quad Bike through various challenging terrains: dense jungle, rice fields, muddy tracks, rivers, and even an artificial cave. This activity provides maximum freedom and excitement for both single and tandem riders, perfect for those who want to explore Bali's nature in an extreme way.
program: Hotel pick-up and travel to the ATV location
Arrive at the location, receive Safety Briefing and driving equipment
ATV Quad Bike Ride Session (Duration ±1.5 to 2 hours)
Clean up at the changing room and shower facilities
Enjoy Indonesian Lunch
Return transfer to the hotel
tours.note:
Price varies depending on the selected riding mode:

- Single Ride (1 person on 1 ATV): IDR 750,000 / Pax
- Tandem Ride (2 people on 1 ATV): IDR 1,300,000 / 2 Pax
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Bali ATV Quad Bike Adventure package. I want to choose the [SINGLE RIDE/TANDEM RIDE] option for [NUMBER] people. Please advise on availability.

tours.title: Spiritual Healing Journey in Ubud
tours.description: Experience inner peace and energy cleansing through a traditional Balinese spiritual healing session in Ubud. This package offers various services ranging from the Melukat ceremony to palm reading and trauma healing. Guided by a local healer, this journey aims to balance your chakras and open your aura.
program: Hotel pick-up and travel to the healing center/water temple in Ubud
Receive Briefing and change clothes (Sarong)
Perform the selected consultation and ceremony service (Duration 20-60 minutes)
Session guided by a licensed Healer
Return transfer to the hotel
includes: Personal Service and Consultation by the Healer
tours.note:
Price varies depending on the selected Spiritual/Healing service:

1. Melukat (Purification): IDR 600K
2. Palm Reading: IDR 750K
3. Palm Reading + Melukat: IDR 1.000K
4. Open Aura, Chakra & Trauma Healing: IDR 1.050K
5. Option 4 + Melukat: IDR 1.300K
6. Palm Reading, Open Aura & Trauma Healing: IDR 1.500K
7. FULL PACKAGE (All Services): IDR 1.700K

(Note: Healer service duration is ±20-60 minutes depending on the option.)

tours.title: Bali Jungle Swing: Iconic Swing Above the Forest Valley
tours.description: Get the most iconic experience and photos in Bali by swinging at an extreme height, right above the Tegalalang tropical forest valley. This package includes access to various types of swings and famous photo spots, offering unbeatable natural views.
program: Hotel pick-up and travel to the Swing location in Ubud/Tegalalang
Arrive at the location and receive Safety Briefing
Access to various types of swings (Single, Tandem, Extreme) and Photo Spots
Free time to enjoy the view and take photos
Enjoy Lunch / Drinks
Return transfer to the hotel
includes: Access to All Types of Swings
tours.note:
Price varies depending on the number of participants. The prices below are per person:

- 2 - 3 Persons: IDR 600,000 / person (USD 40)
- 4 - 6 Persons: IDR 500,000 / person (USD 33)

(Note: Price includes all facilities mentioned.)
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Bali Jungle Swing Tegalalang package. Please advise on availability and price details for [NUMBER] people.

tours.title: Sea Adventure: The Most Complete Bali Watersport Package (Nusa Dua)
tours.description: Enjoy a day full of action and excitement with the best Watersport package selection in Bali. Starting from the adrenaline-pumping Parasailing Adventure to the unique Sea Walker, this package offers a perfect combination of thrilling water activities in the calm waters of Tanjung Benoa. Suitable for all levels of adventurers!
program: Hotel pick-up and travel to Tanjung Benoa/Nusa Dua
Arrive at the location, receive Safety Briefing
Execute the selected range of Watersport activities (according to package I to VI)
Clean up at the Changing Room & Shower, receive a Towel
Enjoy Lunch
Return transfer to the hotel
tours.note:
Price varies depending on the selected Watersport package. All prices are per person:

1. Package I (IDR 1,000K): Parasailing Adventure, Banana Boat, Jet Ski
2. Package II (IDR 1,200K): Sea Walker, Banana Boat, Jet Ski
3. Package III (IDR 1,300K): Donut Boat, Banana Boat, Fly Board
4. Package IV (IDR 1,300K): 1x Diving, Banana Boat, Fly Fish
5. Package V (IDR 1.300K): Sea Walker, Fly Fish, Jet Ski
6. Package VI (IDR 1,300K): Fly Board, Sea Walker, Donut Boat

tours.title: Bali Cooking Class: Learn Authentic Local Recipes
tours.description: Join an authentic culinary journey where you will learn the art of making traditional Balinese dishes from scratch. Starting with a short visit to a local market to choose fresh ingredients, a hands-on cooking session guided by a chef, and finally enjoying your own cooked meal for lunch or dinner. This experience provides deep insight into Balinese culture and spices.
program: Hotel pick-up and travel to the cooking class location
Visit to the traditional market (Optional, depending on schedule)
Introduction to traditional Balinese spices and ingredients
Hands-on Cooking Session with Chef guidance
Enjoy your own cooked meal (Lunch/Dinner)
Return transfer to the hotel
includes: Fuel, Parking Fee, and Toll Fee
Hands-on Cooking Instruction by a Professional Chef
tours.note:
Price varies depending on the number of participants. Prices below are per person:

- 2 - 3 People: IDR 600,000 / person (USD 40)
- 4 - 6 People: IDR 550,000 / person (USD 37)
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Bali Cooking Class package. Please advise on availability and price details for [NUMBER] people.

tours.title: Bali Silver Jewelry Class: Create Your Own Work of Art
tours.description: Learn the traditional art of Balinese silver jewelry making under the guidance of skilled local artisans. You will get a hands-on experience in designing, shaping, and finishing one unique silver jewelry piece that you can take home as a valuable souvenir. A perfect activity for creativity and cultural experience.
program: Hotel pick-up and travel to the silver studio in Ubud/Celuk
Arrive at the location and receive an introduction to traditional silver techniques
Design and Jewelry Making Session
Take home the finished silver jewelry piece
Return transfer to the hotel
includes: Fuel, Parking Fee, and Toll Fee
Workshop Instruction by a Professional Silversmith
One Finished Jewelry Piece (to take home)
tours.note:
Price varies depending on the number of participants. Prices below are per person:

- 2 - 3 People: IDR 850,000 / person (USD 57)
- 4 - 6 People: IDR 800,000 / person (USD 53)

(Price includes base silver material for one piece of jewelry. Additional charges apply if the weight exceeds the determined limit.)

tours.title: Exclusive Snorkeling in Nusa Penida
tours.description: Dive into the underwater beauty of Nusa Penida with an exclusive snorkeling package to three iconic spots: Manta Bay (chance to see majestic Manta Rays), Gamat Bay (rich coral gardens and tropical fish), and Wall Point (steep coral wall full of marine life). This Full Day trip includes Fast Boat return tickets, a private boat for snorkeling, and all equipment, offering a safe and unforgettable sea adventure for nature lovers.
program: Hotel pick-up (early morning) and transfer to Sanur harbor
Public Fastboat trip to Nusa Penida
Arrive at Penida, board a private boat for Snorkeling activities (Manta Bay, Gamat Bay, Wall Point, depending on sea conditions)
Enjoy Indonesian Lunch
Return trip to the harbor by Fastboat
Return transfer to the hotel in Bali (afternoon/evening)
includes: Round Trip Fastboat Ticket to Nusa Penida
tours.note:
Price varies depending on the number of participants. Prices below are per person:

- 2 - 3 People: IDR 900,000 / person (USD 60)
- 4 - 6 People: IDR 800,000 / person (USD 53)
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I am interested in the Bali Snorkeling in Nusa Penida package. Please advise on availability and price details for [NUMBER] people.

tours.title: Iconic Exploration of West Nusa Penida
tours.description: Experience an iconic journey to West Nusa Penida, visiting dramatic cliffs and hidden beaches such as Kelingking Beach, Broken Beach, and Angel’s Billabong. Prices vary based on the number of participants.
program: Meet at Sanur Beach Meeting Point for check-in and departure preparation.
Cross to Nusa Penida by fast speedboat.
Arrive in Nusa Penida and begin the land tour immediately.
First Destination: Broken Beach and Angel's Billabong, enjoying these iconic natural formations.
Continue the trip to Kelingking Beach, followed by scenic views from Paluang Cliff.
Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant provided in the package.
Visit Crystal Bay for free time to relax on the white sandy beach.
Return to the harbor.
Cross back to Sanur Beach by speedboat.
Arrive in Sanur — tour ends.
tours.note:
The price per person becomes cheaper for larger groups (Pax):
1 person: IDR 800,000 / Pax
2 people: IDR 500,000 / Pax
3 people: IDR 400,000 / Pax
4 people: IDR 350,000 / Pax
5 people: IDR 320,000 / Pax
6 people: IDR 300,000 / Pax

Note: Prices are all-inclusive, covering all facilities mentioned above. Fastboat departure from Sanur is at 08:00 WITA.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I’m interested in the Iconic West Nusa Penida Tour package. Could you please check availability and pricing for [NUMBER OF PEOPLE] people?

tours.title: Exotic Exploration of East Nusa Penida
tours.description: Discover the eastern wonders of Nusa Penida, famous for its dramatic cliffs, pristine beaches, and breathtaking viewpoints. Visit Diamond Beach, Atuh Beach, Molenteng Tree House, and the majestic panorama of Thousand Islands. Perfect for travelers seeking adventure and authentic natural beauty.
program: Meet at Sanur Harbor for check-in and preparation before departing to Nusa Penida.
Cross to Nusa Penida by fastboat.
Upon arrival, begin the land tour to the first destination.
Visit Teletubbies Hill, known for its green rolling hills and unique landscape.
Continue to the iconic Molenteng Tree House and enjoy the stunning panorama of Raja Lima/Thousand Islands.
Head to Diamond Beach to admire its impressive white cliffs and turquoise waters.
Lunch break at a local restaurant.
Visit Atuh Beach, a favorite destination with magnificent cliff formations.
Return to the harbor for the boat ride back to Sanur.
Arrive back at Sanur Harbor — tour ends.
tours.note:
The price per person becomes more affordable for larger groups (Pax):
1 person: IDR 800,000 / Pax
2 people: IDR 500,000 / Pax
3 people: IDR 400,000 / Pax
4 people: IDR 350,000 / Pax
5 people: IDR 320,000 / Pax
6 people: IDR 300,000 / Pax

Note: Prices are all-inclusive, covering all listed facilities. Fastboat departure from Sanur is scheduled at 08:00 WITA.
tours.whatsappText: Hello, I’m interested in the Exotic East Nusa Penida Tour package. Could you please check availability and pricing for [NUMBER OF PEOPLE] people?

tours.title: Exotic Combination of West & East Nusa Penida
tours.description: The perfect combination package to explore the iconic beauty of Nusa Penida in just one day. You will visit favorite destinations on both the West and East sides, from dramatic cliffs and exotic beaches to the most famous photo spots such as Diamond Beach, Broken Beach, Angel Billabong, and Kelingking Beach.
program: Meet at Sanur Harbor for registration and fastboat ticket collection.
Gather and depart for Nusa Penida by fastboat.
Arrive in Nusa Penida and meet our local driver to begin the land tour.
Visit Diamond Beach and enjoy the stunning white cliffs and crystal–blue ocean.
Continue to Broken Beach and Angel Billabong, two iconic must-visit destinations.
Lunch break at a prepared local restaurant.
Head to Kelingking Beach, one of the most famous spots in Nusa Penida.
Visit Paluang Cliff to enjoy a unique viewpoint of Kelingking from another angle.
Return to the harbor for the boat ride back to Sanur.
Arrive at Sanur Harbor — tour ends.
tours.note:
Price per person depends on the number of participants (Pax):
1 person: IDR 900,000 / pax
2 persons: IDR 550,000 / pax
3 persons: IDR 466,000 / pax
4 persons: IDR 400,000 / pax
5 persons: IDR 350,000 / pax

Note: The price already includes all facilities in the package (All-Inclusive). Fastboat departures from Sanur are usually in the morning.

tours.title: Exclusive Snorkeling Experience in Nusa Penida
tours.description: Dive into the underwater beauty of Nusa Penida with this exclusive snorkeling package that covers three iconic spots: Manta Bay (chance to encounter majestic Manta Rays), Gamat Bay (rich coral gardens and tropical fish), and Wall Point (a dramatic coral wall full of marine life). This Full Day trip includes round-trip Fast Boat tickets, a private boat for snorkeling, and complete equipment — offering a safe, unforgettable marine adventure for nature lovers.
program: Morning hotel pickup and transfer to Sanur Harbor
Public fastboat ride to Nusa Penida
Arrival in Nusa Penida, board a private boat for Snorkeling activities (Manta Bay, Gamat Bay, Wall Point — adjusted based on sea conditions)
Enjoy Indonesian-style Lunch
Return trip to the harbor by fastboat
Transfer back to your hotel in Bali (late afternoon/evening)
includes: Round-trip Fastboat Tickets to Nusa Penida
tours.note:
Prices vary depending on the number of participants. Prices below are per person:

- 2 – 3 People: IDR 900,000 / person (USD 60)
- 4 – 6 People: IDR 800,000 / person (USD 53)
